name: Asteroid Survival - UP957509
description:
The Game:

Oh No! The Ship Is Out Of Control! All You Have Left Is Your Rather Dodgey Left Thruster, and Your Trusty Laser Cannon!

Objective:

Try To Survive By Weaving And Blasting Your Way Through The Asteroids.

Controls : 

Press  *Space*  To Fire Cannon.
However,  Pressing Space Also Activates Your Thruster . . .   Be Careful!
